metadata.description:
Marc Mason used to be the Fist of Justice and he was Charm City's greatest defender. But one fatal mistake caused a mental breakdown and allowed his nemesis, the evil Doctor Dibuk to soundly defeat him. 

Then, after having spent the better part of the last thirty years with no recollection of who he was or what he was capable of, Marc Mason was ‘rescued' from within his own mind by the mysterious Professor Mistk. Now, with help from his old friend Harlan "Black Light" Harris, Mason tries to piece his life back together and adjust to the world of the 21st century...
metadata.name: Fist of Justice
